name: Monophobia (itch) (latedude2, abadabada, anastazjagaluza, DavidRasmussen, MikkMunk, Kristinn, Kasia, Dovii)
name_original: Monophobia (itch) (latedude2, abadabada, anastazjagaluza, DavidRasmussen, MikkMunk, Kristinn, Kasia, Dovii)
description:
Darkness surrounds the town and causes chaos. People are forced to flee their homes. Evil forces chase every being that is still living on this planet, consuming the ones that wander alone. Only stories and memories are left of the people that disappeared. Don't become one of them.

Follow one rule to survive: don't be alone.


Controls:

  • WASD keys to move;
  • SHIFT to sprint;
  • MLB to push other objects & people in front of you;
  • MRB to grab & hold other objects & people in front of you.
